Categorize this IT Ticket:

not able to open any document any browser hello hi regarding one assets you have granted open have you received with open have received forwarded about was issue back then when was every resource accessible can you access one documents using ie can access using everything good can close ticket you can thank you have hello available for employees only for employees clients have access could you help with obtaining kind regards engineer en hello regarding task infrastructure already task about investigating why web working external networks for you can contact provide you with using you be able work with web best regards engineer en sent friday re notification error when accessing documents hello afraid we still able open any document any browser with kind regards officer sent friday notification error when accessing documents hello everyone please be advised below issue fixed you can open any document using chrome browser should you still encounter any sort issues with above mentioned please contact we gladly help out thank you for your understanding kind regards analyst ext hub sent thursday notification error when accessing documents hello everyone you have noticed certain documents one cannot be using chrome browser issue originates fact browser cannot fully implement certain features our platform offers we aware issue we currently investigating meanwhile we advise you use explorer or for opening documents we apologize for inconveniences caused we notify you more information becomes available kind regards analyst ext hub

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing the Ticket**

I'm currently focused on classifying the IT ticket. My process involves a careful review of the ticket's content to assign it to the most fitting category from the provided list: ["Hardware", "HR Support", "Access", "Miscellaneous", "Storage", "Purchase", "Internal Project", "Administrative rights"].

**Resolving the Access Issue**

I've confirmed the ticket centers on an inability to open documents and access files, directly fitting the "Access" category. My analysis of the repeated phrases related to document access and browser functionality solidifies this classification.

**Confirming the Category**

I've finalized my assessment of the IT ticket. Based on the repeated references to document access and browser functionality issues, I am confirming that the ticket definitively belongs to the "Access" category, as this most accurately reflects the core problem described.
